NewsArticle.Title: Small Updates
NewsArticle.Content:
Excommunicate- Only Clerics, Ministers, and High Priests can excommunicate.
Arena-Master Weapons are allowed into the Arena.
There will be a Dev Chat today at 4:00pm pst. you can access the chat at 4pm pst with mIRC at server irc.stratics.com port 6667 channel #PlanetDA or use PlanetDA's java client at http://www.planetda.net/IRCChat.php
